turns.content:
How would you ask these questions: Tell everyone a little about you, where you from, what you like doing?
What goals are you pursuing right now?
Who has made the most influence in your life?
Who is the one person that you admire the most (alive or dead)?
What is the hardest challenge you’re had to overcome in your life?
When have you grown the most in your life and what caused that growth?
Where is your favorite place to relax and renew?
What books have changed your life the most?
What Is the biggest thing that you want the audience to take away today?
How can people get a hold of you to talk about your business?

1. Can you tell us a little about yourself? Where are you from and what do you enjoy doing?
2. What goals are you currently working towards?
3. Who has had the most significant influence in your life?
4. Who do you admire the most, alive or deceased?
5. Can you share with us the toughest challenge you have had to overcome in your life?
6. At what point in your life did you experience the most growth, and what led to that growth?
7. Where is your favorite place to unwind and rejuvenate?
8. Are there any books that have had a significant impact on your life?
9. What is the most important message you want our audience to take away from our conversation today?
10. How can people contact you to learn more about your business?

Rewrite and improve: Thank you ------------------- for your insight and sharing your story, someone was waiting on you to share so they can grab on to hope that they can get through whatever they are going through. 
As we close out, remember your story is your superpower and everyone has one, what is yours audience?
You can reach us on Brown Suga Wellness Facebook page if you are interested in being apart of this healing movement through stories.

Thank you for sharing your insight and personal story with us. Your willingness to share may provide hope and inspiration for someone else who may be going through a similar experience.
As we conclude, remember that your story is your superpower and everyone has one. What is your story, audience?
If you would like to be a part of our healing movement through storytelling, you can reach us on the Brown Suga Wellness Facebook page.

rewrite and improve: As women of the the problem i solve is we are so overwhelmed with all the gurus out their claiming to solve our mental clarity about our holistic wellness, but what we need is a lifeplan that we create to map out the life we want

As women, one of the issues we often face is feeling overwhelmed by the multitude of gurus and experts claiming to offer solutions for our mental clarity and holistic wellness. However, what we truly need is a personalized life plan that we ourselves create, that helps us map out and achieve the life we want.

Rewrite and improve: I help women of color to create a personalized life plan unique to their needs in 90 days with our BOSS Model without having the overwhelm of evaluating countless coaches so they can create the fulfilled life they want

As a counselor and life coach, my mission is to empower women of color to take control of their mental and emotional well-being by co-creating a personalized life plan that caters to their unique needs and goals in just 90 days. Using our BOSS Model, I help eliminate the overwhelming process of evaluating various coaches and provide a clear path towards living a fulfilled life.
